privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.dataCollectionText: Bilio is designed with your privacy in mind. We do NOT collect, transmit, or store any of your personal or business data on external servers.
privacy.offlineFirstText: All data you create (business profiles, clients, invoices, quotes) is stored exclusively on your device using secure local storage. Your data never leaves your device unless you explicitly choose to export or share it.
privacy.dataStorageText: We use AsyncStorage (on-device storage) to persist your business information, client records, and documents. This data is stored in encrypted format on your device and is only accessible by the Bilio app.
privacy.cameraPermission: To upload your business logo or client images
privacy.filePermission: To save and share PDF invoices and quotes
privacy.permissionsNote: These permissions are only used for their stated purposes and never for data collection.
privacy.dataSharingText: We do not share, sell, or transmit your data to any third parties. When you share an invoice or export your data, you control exactly what is shared and with whom.
privacy.analyticsText: Bilio does NOT use any analytics, tracking, or telemetry services. We have no way to monitor your usage or access your data.
privacy.securityText: Your data security is enhanced by our offline-first approach. Since data never leaves your device (except when you explicitly export it), there is no risk of data breaches or unauthorized server access.
privacy.dataRetentionText: You have complete control over your data. You can export all your data at any time from the Settings screen. To delete all data, simply uninstall the app or use the "Clear All Data" option in Settings.
privacy.childrenText: Bilio is intended for business use by adults. We do not knowingly collect data from children under 13.
privacy.changesText: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected in the app with an updated "Last Updated" date.
privacy.contactText: If you have questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through the app store listing.
privacy.summary: Bottom Line: Bilio is 100% private. Your data never leaves your device. No accounts, no servers, no tracking.

about.privacyMessage: This app is 100% offline. All your data stays on your device. No cloud sync, no servers, no tracking. You own your data completely.
